definition: to meet again/until we meet again/goodbye
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: After a certain age, programmers rarely switch languages voluntarily.
sentences.chinese: 过了一定的年龄，程序员很少再会主动的更换语言了。

sentences.english: Mrrr? Very well, if you must. Fare you well, Walks the Night Alone.
sentences.chinese: 喵？好吧，如果你非走不可。再会啰，夜间独行客。

sentences.english: Desdemona. Shall I deny you? no: farewell, my lord.
sentences.chinese: 苔丝狄蒙娜我会拒绝您的要求吗？不。再会，我的主。
再会，2013科仪展，赫西离心机明年再来。

sentences.english: They plan on seeing each other again, whether in Paris or Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 他们计划在巴黎或伊斯坦布尔再会。

sentences.english: I hope I’ll meet up with many of you at the next stop.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在下一站再会你们当中的多位。

sentences.english: You miss himself since have been poisoned, who is good-bye Yi's believing him the person who puts poison in?
sentences.chinese: 你想他自己既已中毒，谁再会疑信他就是下毒的人？

sentences.english: That's what I thought. Adios, amigos .
sentences.chinese: 我就知道，再会了，朋友们。

sentences.english: GREensleeves now farewell, adieu, God I pray to prosper thee.
sentences.chinese: 别了，绿袖，再会，我祝愿你幸福快乐。

sentences.english: I wish to say 'arrivederci' to Ancelotti.
sentences.chinese: 我想对安切洛蒂说‘再会’。

sentences.english: B: Thank you for your help. Good-bye.

definition: goodbye/see you again later
to see each other/to meet in person
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later/We'll cross that bridge when we get there
to meet (by chance)/to come across
to meet together/to assemble
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to meet again/to be reunited/reunion
future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
if only (sth were possible)/I wish (that)
leave-taking/to say goodbye
lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
to part forever/eternal parting (i.e. death)
to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
to take one's leave/to bid farewell
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
